[**ExtraVM**](https://extravm.com) offers OpenVZ and KVM VPS in Montreal, Gravelines and Dallas. You can request custom network firewall rules to be assigned for your IPv4. If you're interested check out our LET plans below. We take weekly backups of all OpenVZ VPS, and have multiple layers of resource and hardware monitoring setup for each server, reliability is our main goal, unlike some others. We also support IPv6 and include it with every server.  
  
If you have a question just [submit a ticket](https://www.extravm.com/billing/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=3), typical response time during North America daytime hours is under 15 minutes. You can also contact us via live chat on our website if we're available.
